title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: American Indians of the Fur Trade
body: American Indians of the Fur Trade         American Indians of the Fur Trade Era Trunk Contents NPS Photo  3rd-9th  This trunk features replica items of American Indians of the Columbia River watershed during the time when David Thompson was exploring the Columbia River. Includes resources useful in the classroom to learn about American Indian life.   Trunk Reservations Trunks are geared for 3rd-9th grade, but it is intended as a resource for you and your students.     Fill out our reservation form to borrow this trunk or contact our education specialist for more information.
